title: Lecture Videos
body: What is the code to view the echo 360 lectures? I cannot find them

title: Quiz
body: When can we start off our first quiz?

comments.body: There is no quiz this week.

title: Lecture videos
body: Where are the lecture videos for this class?

comments.body:
See the answer to #1.

Going forward, please do not post the same question more than once.  It's a big class and the forum is less useful if there are lots of dups.

title: Definition of sorted for question 5
body:
"Return a list of (student club) tuples, sorted and grouped by club."
Would a sorted list be sorted first alphabetically based off club name, then within the club segments of the list it would be sorted based on the name of the student?

comments.body: Yes, this is correct (see the example in main() for sample output).

title: Gradescope tests
body: Will the gradescope assignment automatically run private tests and tell us if we passed them all or not?

comments.body: The tests will be private for this assignment.  That said, you should be able to test your solutions yourself by looking at the examples in main() and modifying them.

title: minor negligible possible typo in hw pdf
body: ![image.png](https://campuspro-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/.../image.png), ![image.png](https://campuspro-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/17cda193-edc7-46d3-9ee4-969df8027cb7/a7091dc7-08e2-4dbe-b297-a5f126deb1fa/image.png). In the pdf it seems question 7 was run on an n=13 while in the starter code its n=19. This shouldn't get in the way of doing the hw.

conversation.name: minor negligible possible type in hw pdf

comments.body: Good catch!  I originally had it as 13, and then decided I liked 19 better.

title: Gradescope Submission HW0
body: Hi, is the submission page for HW0 up on Gradescope yet? When I logged in to Gradescope, it said: "Your instructor hasn't released any assignments yet.".

comments.body: Still doing some tweaking with the autograder -- I'll try and get it posted tomorrow.  Sorry for the delay.
